attributes.action: Make it compulsory for visitors to patients needing barrier nursing to wear protective clothing, i.e. gloves and aprons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It used to be compulsory to wear gloves and plastic aprons when visiting an infected patient on a ward or side room to try to avoid the risk of contamination throughout the hospital.  However, it is now not obligatory to wear protective clothing if you are a visitor.  In the fight against hospital infectionn, it is almost unbelievable that this simple procedure is no longer thought necessary.
